net.proteusframework.internet.servlet.auth

Class AutoRememberMeServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.internet.servlet.auth.AutoRememberMeServices
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.acegisecurity.ui.rememberme.RememberMeServices

    @Configurable
public class AutoRememberMeServices
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.acegisecurity.ui.rememberme.RememberMeServices
    Automatically create an authenticated principal tied to a browser cookie or authenticates using a cookie. Similar to normal RememberMeServices in that a cookie is used, however different in that the principal is remembered implicitly by virtue of visiting the site.

    Also will process authentication based upon TokenCredentials

    Author:
    Ken Logan (ken@i2rd.com)

    • Method Detail

      • authenticateViaCookie

        protected org.acegisecurity.Authentication authenticateViaCookie(javax.servlet.http.Cookie cookie)
        Authenticate via cookie. If the cookie references a persisted principal it will be used, otherwise an empty wrapper will be used.
        Parameters:
        cookie - the cookie
        Returns:
        the authentication or null if cannot authenticate

        Parameters:

        public void setCookieAuthEnabled(boolean enabled)
